separator.title: separator
separator.description: The separator is a pattern that describes where each division of the qr code should occur.

eanIndex.title: eanIndex
eanIndex.description: The eanIndex is the index of the division made by the separator in which the Ean will be within the qr code.

action.title: action
action.description: The action that will do after the scan.

mode.title: mode
mode.description: The mode indicates if we will have 1 Ean for 1 Sku or Many Eans for 1 Sku.
